description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. Knitwear fashion parade of the latest dashing collection from Tim Wear. 2. Showcase of bouquets and landscapes by French floral artist Paul de Boubon. 3. Footage from the 28th International Leather Week in Paris - fashion ballet organised by Norbert Schmidt. Beautiful classic designs, vintage 1970s.
